name: Wreckage - Pro Version
description:
Wreckage is car racing and stunt game with damage, realistic car physics, ragdoll simulation and beautiful graphics, inspired by Flatout games.
Drive through the dirt and sand, avoid obstacles and perform different stunts!

Features Include:
• No Ads
• Start with 10 000 coins
• 5+ Game modes:
Long-Jump, Dirt Race, High-Jump, Circuit Race, Bowling
• 9+ Unique Cars
• Realistic Car physics with destructible cars
• Ragdoll physics simulation
• Engine Upgrades
• Nitro Upgrades
• Car Suspension Upgrades
• Custom Car Paint
• Custom Decals with Paint
• Custom Characters
• Custom Helmets with Paint
• Replay System
• Graphics options
